record.title: AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 3355, HOMEOWNERS' DEFENSE ACT OF 2007
record.narrative:
AUTHORIZING THE CLERK TO MAKE CORRECTIONS IN ENGROSSMENT OF H.R. 3355, HOMEOWNERS' DEFENSE ACT OF 2007 -- (House of Representatives - November 08, 2007)

[Page: H13370]

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that the Clerk be authorized to make technical corrections in the engrossment of H.R. 3355, to include corrections in spelling, punctuation, section numbering, cross-referencing, and amendatory instructions, and the insertion of appropriate headings.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from Florida?
